item.description:
The Annual Ski and Snowboard Swap will take place on Saturday, November 3rd from 9 am to 5 pm.
This is your opportunity to sell your old skis, boots or snowboards and buy new or used equipment! The ski swap draws a huge crowd and is well worth attending. Not only do we have people's equipment for sale, but Punam's Ski & Snowboard Shop and another ski shop bring in previous year's equipment for sale at great deals.
If you are selling, used equipment is being accepted at Putnam's, 2998 Lafayette Road, (Rt 1), Portsmouth on one of the following dates:
Thursday and Friday, November 1 & 2 between 5:30 - 8:30 pm
Saturday, November 3 between 7 - 10 am
Sale money or unsold equipment will be returned on Saturday, November 3 between 3:00 and 5:30 pm

group.name: The Portsmouth "and beyond" Nite Out Meetup Group

item.name: Let's go to the Swap
